text: Gosha Academy, in the headmistress's officeー

name: Me
text: Asagi-sensei!

name: Igawa Asagi
text: Fuma-kun. I was waiting for you.
In the office, the stern-faced Asagi-sensei and a upperclass student whom I had seen around before were waiting for me.

name: Me
text: (That girl is one year above me... If I remember correctly her name is... Kise Hotaru-senpai?)
I had heard that she was influential enough to be deployed on combat missions, but this would be my first time talking with her directly. She, too, had a serious look on her face.

name: Me
text: Did something happen again?

name: Asagi
text: Yes, something did. But before that, I have something to tell you, Captain.

name: Me
text: Me?
I felt a pang of anxiety in my chest as Asagi-sensei's serious eyes stared at me fixedly.

name: Asagi
text: Hebiko has been captured by the enemy.
I couldn't believe my ears. But still, it was a misfortune that you occasionally heard about in the Taimanin world.
I had heard that Mizuki Yukikaze's mother also had gone missing during a mission despite being a skilled Taimanin.

name: Me
text: But why Hebiko!!? Who was she captured by!?

name: Kise Hotaru
text: I will explain that.

name: Me
text: You will...?

name: Hotaru
text: Nice to meet you, you're Fuma-kun, right? I'm Kise Hotaru. I've heard about you from Hebiko-chan.

name: Me
text: What happened!? Why was Hebiko caught?

name: Hotaru
text: That's...
Hotaru-senpai began talking about the incident with a pained expression on her face.
